entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local smoke. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 19. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 05 May 2016
